name: legible_anandtech.com
description: If you love reading long-form articles at the venerable anandtech.com you will love this style. It does not alter anything about the site's layout which is already very easy to get used to; it only alters the typeface and font-size of the 'article' section and the 'comments' section. You will find yourself reading and participating more on the site if you apply this stylesheet.

user.name: Hersh Verthun
user.about: I fix websites so I can read.

additional_info:
v 1.0

This stylesheet requires 'Quercus', 'Open Sans' and 'Ubuntu' typeface to be available on your system. I run an Ubuntu 14.04 box and the style was tested on Firefox 34.0.
